summary: I am a co-founder of Reprex, a company that is trying to automate business, scientific and policy research workflows from data acquisition to presentation.  We want to make estimation, forecasting, valuation and predictive models from econometrics, corporate finance, and machine learning available in fragmented and vulnerable industries like music, film, book, photography and ecotech.  https://reprex.nl/#about

projects:
[{'title': 'iotables', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'Starting from various creative industry economic impact analysis calculation I created an open source R software package that downloads recent Eurostat data, pre-processes them, and performs various economic impact calculations on the gross value added, national economy, investments, tax base, etc. It creates the multipliers, indicators needed for such studies, or for use as KPIs.  This is data science, part economics, part statistics, part programming.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dániel', 'last_name': 'Antal', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-Founder at Reprex B.V.'}]}, {'title': 'Central & Eastern European Music Industry Report 2020', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'description': 'The results of the first Hungarian, Slovak, Croatian and Czech music industry reports are compared with Armenian, Austrian, Bulgarian, Lithuanian, Serbian and Slovenian data and findings. Demand and supply of music, how music markets work, what are the price and quantity developments. Availability of grants.  Policy issues: local content, taxation, value transfer, valuation, music export.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dániel', 'last_name': 'Antal', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-Founder at Reprex B.V.'}]}, {'title': 'A ProArt zeneipari jelentése 2015 - ProArt Music Industry Report 2015 [Hungary]', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': "Hungary's first music industry report. Following the three income streams model from creation till audience, we summerized for the the number of works that were created, recorded, staged in Hungary in a year. We calculated their revenues, their value added, their employment effect and the investments of the recording industry. There is an extensive business development and policy conclusions chapter in the 143-pages report, which is the first in a series about the Central European music industry. ", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dániel', 'last_name': 'Antal', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-Founder at Reprex B.V.'}]}, {'title': 'Economic analysis and tariff review of private copying remuneration', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': 'An economic analysis of the evolution of private copying, its benefits for the Hungarian households and the equitable remuneration for music and film copyright and neighboring right owners. Review of the technological and regulatory evolution of the PCR regime in Europe.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dániel', 'last_name': 'Antal', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-Founder at Reprex B.V.'}]}, {'title': 'Online publishing (EU news and policy analysis)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'description': "Via a small fund managed by Visegrad Investments acquisition and management of the online media publisher for EurActiv.hu, in the company Media Activ Kft. Even though the company was profitable, EurActiv decided to pull out from Hungary's troubled media environment. ", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dániel', 'last_name': 'Antal', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-Founder at Reprex B.V.'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Rita', 'last_name': 'Kiss', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Data Analyst at NXP Semiconductors, Future of Finance Team'}]}, {'title': "AmCham Position Brief 'Energy Policy as a Pillar of Hungarian National Competitiveness'", 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}}, 'description': "Preparing, negotiating, discussing and presenting policy brief 'Energy Policy as a Pillar of Hungarian National Competitiveness' for the incoming government for the largest international investor chamber in Hungary about power generation, energy infrastructure, distribution, subsidies and mining. 
http://www.amcham.hu/download/001/181/Energy-Positin-Brief-_ENG-Final.pdf", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dániel', 'last_name': 'Antal', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-Founder at Reprex B.V.'}]}, {'title': 'Market sizing: The market of re-usable public sector information in Hungary', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'description': 'A localization of "Measuring European Public Sector Information Resources" for Hungary in the fields of 1. Business information, 2. Geographic information 3. Legal information 4. Meteorological information 5. Social data and 6. Transport information. Market sizing, service levels, pricing.
At the time of the study the our company was still called ITCB Consulting, referring to our original mother company.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dániel', 'last_name': 'Antal', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-Founder at Reprex B.V.'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Rita', 'last_name': 'Kiss', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Data Analyst at NXP Semiconductors, Future of Finance Team'}]}, {'title': 'Commissioner for Rail Regulation', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}}, 'description': "As a Commissioner I was responsible for preparing a policy document on opening the Hungarian railway market, drafting a legislative proposal for the government and helping legislation. I was also responsible to set up a railway regulatory body to license new entrants and provide discrimination-free access to Hungary's railway network. This project concluded with the adoption of the Act on Railway Transport (2005.183).
http://net.jogtar.hu/jr/gen/hjegy_doc.cgi?docid=A0500183.TV", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dániel', 'last_name': 'Antal', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-Founder at Reprex B.V.'}]}, {'title': 'Jelentés a Fejlesztéspolitikáról 1993-2003 / Ex post evaluation of Hungary’s domestic and EU-assisted public investments', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}}, 'description': 'During the set up of an ex ante, interim and ex post evaluation and economy unit within the National Development Agency, I was a senior consultant and trainer to this report that aimed at providing a comprehensive analysis of Hungary’s EU accession path. My role in this project was to apply EU evaluation skills gained in the pre-accession (ISPA, Phare) phase and the development of Hungary’s Preliminary National Development Plan earlier, and help indentify, collect, interpret and analyze data sources in various governmental agencies.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Dániel', 'last_name': 'Antal', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-Founder at Reprex B.V.'}]}]

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 68766484, 'name': 'Centre for Competition Policy', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFt4Iqcnk4OnA/company-logo_400_400/0/1597133484543?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=9coFliShPxhbDcBm2ZF76f0T4itaD3Bqqs_JC4SMWJ0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/ccpuea/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Centre for Competition Policy', 'description': None, 'title': 'Research Affiliate', 'employment_type': 'Permanent'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Reprex B.V.', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Reprex B.V.', 'description': 'We would like to make the benefits of highly automated, reproducible research workflows for research & development intensive micro-, small- and medium sized companies, particularly in the creative, cultural and copyright-based industries that do not have in-house data science and data engineering teams. 

In the fields of business & policy research, social sciences, NGOs, data journalism teams we would like to help with automating data acquisition, processing, validation, auditing, documentation, visualization and presentation workflows, so that they can focus on what humans are best: making sense of the data.', 'title': 'Co-Founder', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'CEEMID', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Den Haag', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'CEEMID', 'description': 'After the aqui-hire of Candole Partners, I decided to set up a new data driven consultancy / data analytics practice based around music + film industry clients and an ongoing project CEEMID.  

Currently CEEMID is the basis of a loose partnership with partners and we are looking into expanding this into a larger entity.  More information on www.danielantal.eu', 'title': 'Experienced management consultant and data scientist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1626287, 'name': 'Candole Partners', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHfX3BnR3gqfQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519893619734?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=VfGFphM7yXGg9Nrv2cjNvWoMTIgf7eyv7VDQiNk9E3k', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/candole-partners/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Candole Partners', 'description': 'I started a foreign investments consultancy in Budapest with a small team in Budapest, later moved to the Netherlands and associated with Candole Partners, a consultancy that provides market and transaction analysis and advice to firms investing and operating across Central and Southeast Europe.
- Financial and economic planning for transport and energy infrastructure projects (CBA, NPV, IRR, demand, ex ante, ex post evaluations, corporate and EU funded) 
- Management consulting with corporate finance and quantitative methods (NPV, IRR, ROIC, sales forecasting, cost drivers, time series or panel data analysis)
- Regulatory impact assessment, compliance issues, regulatory changes (tariff calculations, impact on revenue, market share, taxation, etc, SCP and competition authority models)
- Supporting foreign direct investment / buy-side clients (market research, target and location selection, due diligence, fair value)
- Experience in managing a small fund with one acquisition, transactional support,  disinvestment.
